articles.description: The colour experts have created a brand new hue for the annual announcement – and it’s a lilacy blue that speaks to the future of the metaverse
articles.content: Pantone’s Colour of the Year has been running since 1999, and over the years we’ve seen a vast array of shades – including Living Coral, Rose Quartz and Serenity, Radiant Orchid and, for some reason,… [+1574 chars]
